definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin

sentences.english: US Army Rangers at Point du Hoc, Omaha Beach.
sentences.chinese: 美國陸軍遊騎兵在點報責，奧馬哈海灘。

sentences.english: So what exactly has the Oracle of Omaha been up to?
sentences.chinese: 因此，這位“奧馬哈先知”正在忙些什麼呢？

sentences.english: Shoppers have returned to the Westroads Mall in Omaha , Nebraska.
sentences.chinese: 購物者們又回到了內布拉斯加奧馬哈市的西路商場。

sentences.english: Beyond that bridge was the linkup point with units from the 29th Division coming from Omaha.
sentences.chinese: 此橋過去就是與奧馬哈登陸之第29師會師地。

sentences.english: Be the Oracle of Omaha at home.
sentences.chinese: 在家也能成爲奧馬哈先知。

sentences.english: If you aren't already familiar with the limit version of Omaha hi-lo, click and read.
sentences.chinese: 如果你還不熟悉有限注奧馬哈高低牌，請點擊閱讀。

sentences.english: But Mom and Dad aren’t allowed into the yard, much less to Omaha.
sentences.chinese: 但我媽我爸連院子裏都去不了，更不用說去奧馬哈了。

sentences.english: But the Oracle of Omaha faces a few uncertainties ahead.
sentences.chinese: 但是這位奧馬哈先知還是面臨一些不確定性。
